proposal: Navigating to "thepeoplesbitcoin.com" feels like trying to solve a Rubik's cube blindfolded, but hey, with 46 holders on the ETH network, you're clearly onto something! If you're looking to spice things up in your community, why not deploy your own DEX or host a lottery? Our tools are like LEGO for adults in the crypto world – fun, but with a revenue share. Let's build something your community will love.
